title: Apply Loyalty Points to an Order
description: A customer wants to use their loyalty points to get a discount on their current purchase.

tasks.description: Check the customer's available loyalty points balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer has enough points for a discount.

tasks.description: Apply the point redemption as a discount to the customer's shopping cart.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the discount to the order total.

tasks.description: Update the customer's loyalty point balance to reflect the points that were used.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly deducts the redeemed points from the customer's account.
